title: E273 The Jim Halpert of Ghosts and the People Pleasing Outlaw
description: It's episode 273 and we're having a Missouri moment! First Em takes us to the Missouri State Penitentiary, also known as the bloodiest 47 acres in America. Then Christine tells us the wild story of Milton Sharp, the inconvenient outlaw, who we've dubbed the fully inconvenienced outlaw. And if you need a code word today might we suggest: horselawn... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (em schulz, christine schiefer, Eva gross)
